text.tspan: your body is a temple of the holy Spirit
when you pray, go to your inner room,
close the door, and pray to your Father in
ask and it will be given to you; seek and
you will find; knock and the door will be
do to others whatever you would have
I give you a new commandment: love one
another as I have loved you
do good to those who hate you
give to the one who asks of you, and do
not turn your back on the one who wants
when you give alms, do not blow a
